title: Augusta County: John Quincy Adams Nadenbousch to Hester J. Nadenbousch, July 26, 1865
summary: Nadenbousch writes his wife from Staunton where he is doing some repairs. He asks she send him glass panes by coach. He says his work is going slowly owing to the shortage of money in Staunton.
keywords: Family, Home Front, Women, American Civil War
